application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of Lifetime Homes standards pursuant to condition 67 (The Green Quarter - Partial Discharge for Phase 3 of the masterplan) of planning permission 171562VAR dated 16.10.2017 as varied by 185242NMA dated 10.12.2018, 193322NMA dated 02.09.2019, 194098NMA dated 03.10.2019 and 202725NMA dated 11.08.2020 for: : 'demolition of 22 houses; the remediation of the land & the redevelopment of the site to deliver a large mixed use development including residential, non-food retail, food retail, restaurants, bars & cafes, hotel, conference & banqueting, cinema, health care facilities, education facilities, office/studio units, car park, sports pavilion, an energy centre, multi-storey car park and associated car & cycle parking, landscaping, public realm, open space & children's play space. Full application: new access roads from the Hayes-By-Pass & Southall town centre to the application site for vehicle, cycle & pedestrian access, including drainage & a flood relief pond. Widening of South Road across the railway line, for the creation of a bus lane & three new accesses onto Beaconsfield Road. Two bridges over the Grand Union Canal & Yeading Brook to provide pedestrian and cycle access to Minet Country Park & Springfield Road
